nodes.text: Star Wars: Blood Ties is a comic series by Dark Horse Comics. It was originally slated to be a four-issue miniseries focusing on Jango and Boba Fett, A Tale of Jango and Boba Fett but it was decided to continue the series with a second four-part miniseries, Boba Fett is Dead. According to Randy Stradley, the series was canceled after the second arc.
